Watson-Console
==============

Create console commands with ease.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-console.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-console``

Dependencies
------------
